DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , efficacy pharmacokinetics profile 1 4 mg/kg/day RR110 administrate orally 8 week patient active Crohn 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study RR110 Patients With Active Crohn 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients CDAI score range 220 450 Patients CRP > 1 mg/dL Patients hospitalize least 2 week first administration Patients previously use antiTNF antibody , cyclosporine , methotrexate tacrolimus within 12 week screen Patients surgical bowel resection within 4 week screen Patients previously use total parental nutrition 900 kcal/day enteral nutrition within 4 week screen
